overview:
## Discussion

Call this method to begin the sequence of method calls that opens and reads a document asynchronously. The method obtains the file-system location of the document from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/fileURL] property. After the open operation concludes, the code in `completionHandler` is executed.

You can override this method if you want custom document-opening behavior, but if you do it’s recommended that you call the superclass implementation first (`super`). If you don’t call `super`, you should use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator] class to implement coordinated reading. The default implementation calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/performAsynchronousFileAccess(_:)] to schedule the document-reading work for execution on a background queue and then, from the dispatched block, performs file coordination. The queued task then calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/read(from:)].

# open(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Opens a document asynchronously.

## Declaration

```swift
func open(completionHandler: ((Bool) -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
func open() async -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: A block with code to execute after the open operation concludes. The block returns no value and has one parameter:



The block is invoked on the main queue.

## Discussion

Call this method to begin the sequence of method calls that opens and reads a document asynchronously. The method obtains the file-system location of the document from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/fileURL] property. After the open operation concludes, the code in `completionHandler` is executed.

You can override this method if you want custom document-opening behavior, but if you do it’s recommended that you call the superclass implementation first (`super`). If you don’t call `super`, you should use the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSFileCoordinator] class to implement coordinated reading. The default implementation calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/performAsynchronousFileAccess(_:)] to schedule the document-reading work for execution on a background queue and then, from the dispatched block, performs file coordination. The queued task then calls [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocument/read(from:)].

## Reading document data

- **load(fromContents:ofType:)**: Loads the document data into the app’s data model.
- **read(from:)**: Reads the document data in a file at a specified location in the application sandbox.
